text: Captain Newman, M.D. is a 1963 American World War II comedy-drama movie directed by David Miller and was based on the 1961 novel by Leo Rosten. It stars Gregory Peck, Tony Curtis, Eddie Albert, Angie Dickinson, Bobby Darin, Robert Duvall, Dick Sargent, Gregory Walcott, Jane Withers, Barry Atwater and was distributed by Universal Pictures. It was nominated for 3 Academy Awards in 1964. ==Other websites== * * Category:1963 comedy movies Category:1963 drama movies Category:1963 war movies Category:1960s comedy-drama movies Category:American war movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by David Miller Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies set in Arizona
title: Captain Newman, M.D.
